appendix.title: Tinkar Model Concepts
appendix.para: The Tinkar core architecture is designed to be extremely flexible. This flexibility supports the ability to assert relationships among diverse terminologies and to support change in the design of those terminologies. However, it means that there may be more than one way to support any specific requirement. That level of flexibility, by permitting divergent designs, actually impedes interoperability. We provide two levels of guidance to avoid this problem.
